hero.headline: Digitizing Nuclear Procedures for America's Largest Clean Energy Producer
hero.subtitle: We helped Constellation Energy transform decades of paper-based procedures into intelligent digital workflows, saving approximately one million work hours while maintaining the safety margins that nuclear operations demand.

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.intro: A major nuclear utility operating multiple power plants was digitizing decades of paper-based procedures. The goal: transform static documents into intelligent, interactive digital workflows that guide operators through complex tasks while maintaining the safety margins that nuclear operations demand.

cards.title: Zero-Error Tolerance
cards.description: In nuclear environments, every design decision carries weight. The interfaces we create must prevent errors before they happen, not just catch them after.

cards.title: Regulatory Complexity
cards.description: NRC and INPO regulations govern every aspect of nuclear operations. Digital systems must maintain compliance while improving efficiency.

cards.title: Legacy Integration
cards.description: Eight different systems had evolved over decades. New digital tools needed to consolidate functionality while preserving institutional knowledge.

approach.heading: Our Approach
approach.intro: We approached nuclear UX with the humility it demands, listening first, designing second, and treating every interface element as a potential point of failure or protection.

steps.title: Plant Observation
steps.description: On-site research at operating plants. Understanding workflows in the actual environment where they'll be used.

steps.title: Compliance Mapping
steps.description: Deep analysis of NRC and INPO requirements. Ensuring every design decision meets regulatory standards.

steps.title: Error Prevention
steps.description: Designing interfaces where the right action is the easy action. Making mistakes hard, not just caught.

steps.title: Continuous Research
steps.description: POD research model with 20+ presentations. Embedded partnership for ongoing improvement.

work.heading: The Work
work.intro: We designed multiple interconnected systems that work together to support nuclear operations, from procedure execution to work planning to AI-powered automation.

cards.title: Smart Procedures
cards.description: Digital procedure execution system that guides operators through complex tasks with real-time validation, automatic documentation, and error prevention at every step.

cards.title: Work Planning Interface
cards.description: Resource allocation and scheduling system that optimizes maintenance windows, tracks dependencies, and ensures coverage for safety-critical operations.

cards.title: AI-Powered Automation
cards.description: Machine learning systems that optimize workflows, predict maintenance needs, and automate routine decision-making while keeping humans in control.

cards.title: Compliance Dashboard
cards.description: Real-time visibility into regulatory compliance status, audit trails, and documentation requirements across all plant operations.

results.heading: Results
results.intro: Digital transformation at nuclear scale requires patience and precision. The results speak to both efficiency gains and, more importantly, maintained and improved safety margins.

metrics.label: Estimated Hours Saved
metrics.description: Efficiency gains through AI-powered workflow automation and procedure digitization.

metrics.label: Fewer Calculation Errors
metrics.description: Reduced human error through digital validation and guided workflows.

metrics.label: Legacy Systems Consolidated
metrics.description: Multiple legacy systems unified into coherent digital platform.

metrics.label: Research Presentations
metrics.description: Ongoing partnership delivering continuous insights and improvements.
